basic_level.question: Which of the following spaces is NOT a part of the deep palmar space?
basic_level.explanation: The hypothenar space is a separate compartment on the ulnar side of the palm and is not considered part of the deep palmar space.

basic_level.question: Which organism is the most common cause of acute paronychia?
basic_level.explanation: Staphylococcus aureus is the most common cause of acute paronychia, which is an infection of the nail fold.
